properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA TO PELAGIE ISLANDS.
VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND
ADRIFT BETWEEN TRIPOLI (32-55N 013-12E) AND
LAMPEDUSA (35-30N 012-36E). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX:  3 906 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
